title: Learning Makes Me Rich - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Josei   Romance   School Life   Tragedy
tags: Cold Love Interests   Cold Protagonist   Death of Loved Ones   Determined Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Modern Day   Poor to Rich   Second Chance   System Administrator   Wealthy Characters
author: Sù mèi píng shēng   素昧平生
description:
When Zhou Xiu emerged from the mountains, her parents advised her to maintain a good relationship with the Xi family. Getting close to the Young Master Xi is the finest option. 

After living with the Xi family for a while, Zhou Xiu, who had never spent more than $20 on a piece of clothes, watched the life of the filthy rich family and was about to shamefully surrender to money.

That's when she picked up a learning system by accident.

                                                   —————————————

Ms. Xi, a famous local wealthy businesswoman, sponsored a little girl out of boredom, and lovingly let her live in the Xi family.

But to her surprise, the poor girl had her eyes on her son.

Ms. Xi: “….” Misconception and Failures.

Zhou Xi: “o(╥﹏╥)o I am not! I did not! Do not touch me!”>
